Former FBI Director James Comey: s testimony before the Senate Intelligence Committee, where he discussed his relationship with and firing by President Donald Trump, was referenced as evidence to verify the claim.
The official statement from Robin Hayes: the chairman of the North Carolina Republican Party, was cited as supporting the claim that Comey admitted to leaking classified information.
The existence of a memo written by Comey: which was described to the press by a friend of his, was mentioned as the basis of the claim.
